messages.content: Are you happy with the way things are in Britain today?

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats are committed to making Britain a fairer place to live. At the heart of our plans is our fairer tax plan launched by Vince Cable and myself. With the Liberal Democrats, your first Â£10,000 you earn are tax-free.
Rich bankers, millionaires and polluters will all finally be made to pay their fair share.

mentions.tacticalSituation: PS - Remember in many parts of Britain, the Conservatives simply can't win. The choice is between real change with the Liberal Democrats or no change with Labour.

issues.economy: Some people certainly are. Just look at the bankers picking up huge bonuses as if the credit crunch and bank bail-outs never happened.
issues.governance: Just look at the way that pensioners are left to struggle in freezing cold homes. Just look at the scandal of MPs' expenses.
